Menu

Gray House

Authentic Mediterranean Cuisine

Beef carpaccio and homemade pastries stuffed with creamy cottage cheese

Fresh shrimp, scallops, oysters, and calamari served with three sauces

Crispy, flaky burek filled with layers of spinach and feta cheese; baked daily

Fried, crispy zucchini with parmesan, herbs, and spices served with a side of house-made Greek fava
